response.overview: Riya lives a quiet life with her caring mother and paralyzed father. When three suitors arrive for matchmaking, strange paranormal events drive them away. But soon, it's revealed they came with a deadly intent-to kill Riya. As her mother returns with a hidden diary, chilling truths and a dark psychotic crime unravel, exposing who the real culprit is and why Riya's life is in danger.
response.title: Bagundi
